no-new-souls:
There were no new souls waiting to be claimed. As such, you have been born from nothingness and have completely random genes as follows:
{0}
birth:
Your child, now named @{0}#{1}, has been born! Their genes are as follows:
{2}
claimed-soul:
You are now attached to the soul of an entity whose dominant genes are:

adopted: You have requested the creation of an artificial child, whom you will adopt when they are born, at which point you will be notified as such.
proposal:
@{0}#{1} proposes procreation with you. Do you accept? They additionally want to say:
{2}
proposal-rejected: Your procreation proposal to @{0}#{1} was rejected... try for someone else.
rejected-proposal: You have rejected the procreation proposal from @{0}#{1}.
proposal-accepted: Your procreation proposal to @{0}#{1} has been accepted! You will be notified when your child is born.
accepted-proposal: You have accepted the procreation proposal from @{0}#{1}. You will be notified when your child is born.
